Entries.Fri2: Most find me quite unapproachable in this form, an instinct I am more than happy to take advantage of.#$e#If only you had been blessed with any such sense.$6
Entries.Sun10: I've a good many cozy areas in the house.$u#$b#Pick whichever you like, just leave room for me.$u#$e#I promise to be mindful of my... sharper features when slotting myself against you.$u

Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I've finished my work for the day. Might I avail you to join me on the lounge for the evening?$u#$e#Allow my being to shut out all the troubles of the world, 'til there is only us.
Entries.summer_1: Ugh. The instant I step into the sun, I can feel it clash with my very being.#$b#I will take that as my cue to stick to the shade for the foreseeable future.$6
Entries.fall_27: The town festivities would allow me to roam this evening without attracting attention...$8#$b#The question is if it is worth the indignity of my form being assumed a mere costume.$6
Entries.winter_10: On frigid days such as this, there is nothing I'd like better than to hold you close.#$b#Fear not, I will practice utmost caution with my claws.#$e#Or not, if you desire it.$15
Entries.Good_6: ...I can call it early today on work, I suppose.#$b#All the more time to show you all this form is capable of.$15
Entries.Bad_5: %Emet-Selch scoffs and turns away in a flourish of shadow.
Entries.OneKid_2: %kid1 has made a pastime of grabbing at my tendrils of shadow.#$b#My form has garnered many reactions, but being treated as a toy is new.$6

Entries.{{ModId}}_4_1/e {{ModId}}_2_1/e {{ModId}: playful/55 24/Visorlights.EmetSelch 54 24 0 Lewis 63 27 3 farmer 54 27 0/skippable/move Lewis -8 0 3/pause 300/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 100/jump Lewis 5/emote Lewis 16/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "@! Is everything alright?$2#$b#I've, er... heard about sightings of a monster in town.$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 200/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Monster? I am Emet-Selch, sorcerer.$0#$b#And you would be the impotent holder of local office, yes?$u"/pause 300/emote Lewis 16/pause 300/speak Lewis "Excuse me, sir!?$4"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Oh, don't be flustered. I was referring to your methods of governance, not your performances with the town rancher.$7"/pause 50/jump Lewis 8/pause 300/speak Lewis "!!–You!!$4#$b#Now just what is wrong with how I act as mayor!?$4"/pause 500/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Let us turn to the north, shall we?$0"/pause 300/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 0/pause 400/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 200/viewport move 0 -2 2500/pause 2300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "And what is before us but where your so-named center of the community once stood. Not much left of it now, is there?$8#$b#Utterly devoid of any who would act for the betterment of the town.$6"/viewport move 0 2 2500/pause 1500/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 500/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Honestly, I'd call the metaphor heavy-handed, were it a work of fiction.$8#$b#But please, do tell me how adequate of a public official you believe yourself to be.$1"/pause 300/pause 200/speak Lewis "...It's true the place has seen better days. But that doesn't mean I do nothing for Pelican Town!$3#$b#I've served as mayor for twenty years, doing all I can for everyone. Anyone else can run for office, but no one has.$3#$b# That alone should speak for the work I do.$3"/pause 700/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 300/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Hm, let us find out.$8#$b#@, do you have aught to say about Pelican Town?$0"/quickQuestion What do you think about Pelican Town?#I don't know... I'm still new here.#I think it's a pretty good place to live!#It could use some work.(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Not even going to stand by an opinion? Disappointing.$0"(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "I suppose it is fine... If you do not know any better.$0"(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "And there we have it.$u"/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 300/speak Lewis "I see. Thank you for your input.$3"/pause 200/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 200/speak Lewis "Now if there's nothing more I can do for you, goodbye.$3"/pause 300/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Oh, indeed. As fun as it is to prod at your failures, I've work to do, and shall be taking my leave.$7"/pause 1000/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 0 2 2/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 6 0 1 true/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 2000/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 3/pause 500/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Actually, there is one thing."/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Do take your activities with your paramour indoors, next time. For all our sake."/pause 100/jump Lewis 5/emote Lewis 16/shake Lewis 2500/pause 200/faceDirection  Visorlights.EmetSelch 0/pause 300/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 33/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 34/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 35/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 36/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 37/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 38/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 39/pause 200/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 38/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 37/pause 200/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 38/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 39/pause 500/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 35/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 34/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 33/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 32/pause 400/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 7 0 0 true/pause 2000/end
